name: Genevarb.github.com
body:
# Geneva.rb - Geneva Ruby Brigade We're a bunch of Ruby programmers based in Geneva, Switzerland. We get together every month for presentations, demos and discussions. Next meet-up: Tuesday, August 14th 2012 at [Université de Genève](https://maps.google.com/?ll=46.194938,6.13992&spn=0.014868,0.033002&t=m&z=16&iwloc=A) from 7 to 10pm. We share knowledge on the first or second tuesday of each month about the Ruby programming language.
You aren't expected to be an expert to join us! Meetings are free and open to the public. [mailto:contact@genevarb.com](Email) [Twitter](http://twitter.com/genevarb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
